title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: When using Build 200201151, I encountered a bug where the search results are not being selected in an external jar. To reproduce the issue, follow the steps below.
SR:
1. Ensure that you have JDK1.3.1 set as the default JRE and that you have the source for rt.jar.
2. Open the java.io.File class.
3. Search and select the field 'tmpFir'.
4. Observe that the search results are not being selected in the external jar.
